General.Name: Chongqing Gangjiu Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Port Co.,Ltd. engages in the port transit transportation business in China. The company offers port terminal loading and unloading, warehousing, integrated logistics, cargo handling, and other transit transportation services. It serves specialized terminals for containers, heavy goods, chemicals, bulk cargo, and tourist passenger transport; railway loading and unloading; container handling; and multimodal transportation of rail, public, and water. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Gangjiu Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Chongqing Port Co.,Ltd. in November 2021. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.
